title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Mastering Core Biochemistry Concepts: Mobile-Based Evidence-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level biology and chemistry foundational knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can define three core terms that explain enzyme reaction mechanisms.
Learners complete a mini-quiz comparing energy conversion processes in cellular respiration and photosynthesis with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can generate 3-minute audio feedback explaining the structural characteristics and functional relationships of proteins using real-world examples.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
